content: crocheting over the strap you may wish to go back and forth several times for added security this method is more difficult and time-consuming but works much better for thicker straps 7 using the mat there are so many ways to use this mat it s water resistant squishy and lightweight for it s size the straps make it easy to transport and store the basic way to use this mat is to lay on half of it and pull the other half over you like a sleeping bag it can also be used as a blanket folded up and sat on rolled to use as a pillow or worn over the shoulders to keep the rain off my charity is pairing them with afghans and folks are using them as an extra layer over the blanket for warmth in the winter not only would this be a wonderful charity donation i could see it being useful for camping or other outdoor activities there are so many possibilities i hope you had fun making this mat i hope you got some plastic out of landfills and i hope your gift of love can help someone in need 8
